column2: "Oh, hey you. We're almost ready to get going. Are your preparations in order?"
"Indeed, we sally forth! Onward to the Lady's fine war council!"
"Oh, HUEY!"
"Yo! Claris Claes, far too long has it been!"
"Shouldn't you be with Sara on Amduscia? Did something happen?"
"Just came back for supplies and to deliver a report. I'll be heading back soon."
"...You. Show yourself."
"Hello, my name is Phaleg Ives. Pleased to make your acquaintance."
"Yeah... the Demon I've heard about. Almost killed you just now. My bad."
"No no, by all means. It is I who should be sorry for startling you."
"I felt an incredibly strong presence, so I ventured over here to see what it could be. It was you, then."
"You guys all good on your end?"
"How's Earth holding out?"
"Ah yes, the attackers have retreated, it seems. Mother Cluster is cleaning up the aftermath, but all seems to be well now."
"Setting that aside..."
"You really did intend to kill me, didn't you? You had a wonderful look in your eyes. Absolutely magnificent, really."
"Yeah, I must say I'm surprised you didn't even flinch. You seem capable, I'll grant you that much."
"What an honour to receive such praise. If it please you, we could take this outside... What do you say?"
"A one-on-one, you say? Sounds good. A good warm-up sounds like just what I need."
"Oh, a fight? We're fighting?! If we're fighting, I'm joining!"
"Council of Six versus Demon Lady! LET'S GOOO! Claris Claes, ready the battlefield!"
"Right! I'm on it!"
"Uh, what about the war council?"
"Uh, what about Sara?"
"...Indeed. Sorry, lady. Got a date with some shot-callers. Our match will have to wait."
"Very unfortunate, but I understand. Well then, another time, surely."
"Aw man, no fight...?"
"FOR NOW, that is! Indeed, let us also be off! Come, Claris Claes!"
